newsitem.title: USA: Bechtel to build Saudi oil production complex.
newsitem.headline: Bechtel to build Saudi oil production complex.

text.p: Bechtel Corp said Friday it was awarded a contract by the Saudi Arabian Oil Co to build a major oil and natural gas production complex in the so-called Empty Quarter, a remote region in southeastern Saudi Arabia.
The site is located in the Shaybah field, one of the largest ever exploited for development in Saudi Arabia, Bechtel said. It contains large deposits of premium-grade extra light crude oil.
Bechtel, which won the contract in a competitive bid, will provide engineering, procurement and construction services for the upstraem facilities.
It did not disclose the size of the contract.
Consolidated Contractors International of Athens, Greece, will team with Bechtel as a subcontractor responsible for construction work.
